levelling.name: rank
levelling.description: Shows the user's level progress in an image card.

levelling.name: ranking
levelling.description: Shows the top 10 users with most XP and your position.

levelling.name: rank-image
levelling.description: Lets you change the background image of your rank card.

levelling.name: calculate-xp
levelling.description: See how much XP you need for a level and how much more you need.

levelling.name: set-level
levelling.description: Set the level of a user, use this respectfully, please. >~<

levelling.name: status
levelling.description: See the level configuration of your server! -w-

levelling.name: add-reward
levelling.description: Makes me give that role when a user gets to that level! c:

levelling.name: remove-reward
levelling.description: I will stop giving that role when a user gets to that level.

levelling.name: set-message-xp
levelling.description: Set the maximum XP I can give per message. :P

levelling.name: set-base-xp
levelling.description: How much XP is needed to get to level 1, for each level I multiply it by the difficulty and add the base XP.

levelling.name: set-difficulty
levelling.description: How much more difficult it is to get to the next level, the default is 1.1, which I think it's good. o.o

levelling.name: set-level-channel
levelling.description: Where do you want me to send the level up messages? If no one is set I will send them to the system channel, else I'll create one myself, choose.

moderation.name: clear
moderation.description: Deletes the number of messages you choose from the channel.

moderation.name: shutup
moderation.description: Lets me MUTE a member for the period of time you choose :DDD [0 unmutes].
